title: Random FPS drops when I move camera or change my champions direction. Any fixes?
body: Ill be playing and my fps will jump from 160ish to 70 then jump below 60 and back up and so on and so forth. Random lag and stutter. It only started about a week ago and I have no idea why. I used to have steady 100+ FPS with no lag problems.

replies.body:
You might be having those problems if you maybe missed a graphics card update recently, but this can also sometimes happen if your connection if having problems with packet loss. 

Double check our [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) for some general troubleshooting steps, but if that doesn't help use our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) to scan your network logs and test for packet loss. Grab a screenshot of what it says and post it here so I can go over it with you!
